about.title: About Mobility Moments
about.paragraph: Hi, I'm Juli. I have been in the field of physical training for the past 2 years, helping people on the way to achieving their best functional physique and fitness.
about.additionalParagraph: I provide a flexible training schedule with a variety of custom online and onsite personal training plans. Get started on your Mobility journey!

items.title: Custom Training
items.description: Training plans considering all factors of our valuable clients. From fitting your budget to ensuring perfect time slots, we've got you covered.

items.title: Real Results
items.description: Proven techniques and expert coaching to help you achieve a longer, healthier life. I believe in a no-excuse approach to fitness with guaranteed results.

items.title: Calculated Nutrition
items.description: Personalized, calculated nutrition plans with optimized macros to remove obstacles to your progress.

left.description: Mobility Moments is a personal training service that provides safe and effective custom exercise plans. Your workout plan is unique to you and your goals.
